website_summaries.verdict: You'll love this device's compact design and useful features, as well as the recognizable and trusted brand name.
pros: Measures peak flow (PEF) to assist asthmatics in predicting possible attacks
Very trim design is easy to transport and use without drawing a lot of attention
Suitable for adults and kids, as it has dual flow rate function
cons: Some customers complain about damaged packaging
A few  meters didn't function as expected

customer_reviews.title: Easy peak flow
customer_reviews.text: Bought while I was ill during covid to be sure my breathing didn’t go down. Seems accurate
customer_reviews.author: Irish3

customer_reviews.title: Needed One
customer_reviews.text: Been needing one of these for a long time. Finally remembered to get one lol. I like how easy this one is to read. The red, green, and yellow marks leave no doubt as to how my asthma is doing on any given day. Now I will better be able to tell when I might need to seek treatment or when I am just being anxious!
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Russell

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging (too flimsy) AND a delivery issue, but the meter seems to work, so far
customer_reviews.text: The peak flow Meter was sturdy enough to withstand severe damage to its box. External packaging was a flimsy sheet of polythene, completely inadequate., the box the Meter was in was CRUSHED. Sunday delivery finally happened on Tuesday As to the PF Meter itself: Measurements seem to be accurate. I like the instructions for cleaning; my old one lacked that. I haven't had it long.
customer_reviews.author: MizLoo

customer_reviews.title: Open packaging inside Amazon envelop
customer_reviews.text: This product is used to measure peak air flow for people with asthma as allergies. It has to be placed in the mouth. WHO WANTS TO PUT A PRODUCT THAT GOES IN THE MOUTH THAT CAME IN AN OPEN BOX WITH THE PRODUCT EXPOSED AT BOTH ENDS! The product may be fine. I’ll never know. It won’t be going in my mouth! And Amazon is not taking calls putting efforts towards customers in need and senior citizens. This is fine. But, I’m 71 and have asthma. What am I supposed to do????
customer_reviews.author: maureen griffin-doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My asthma is not under control and I can't get into a doctor with the corona virus shutdowns so I ordered this. I was not sure how easy it would be to use- the digital models looked easier but $$$ so I tried this one and it works great. The numbers to gauge by are already preset and its really easy to do a blow and read. Without any medical care this is a good way for me to know that my situation is not getting worse and it lets me know that its not just in my head. Easier to use than you might think and I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Odies mom

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to check on my husband's asthma. It is a comfort to have around!
customer_reviews.author: Taska Smith

customer_reviews.title: Used Item - Yuck!!
customer_reviews.text: Welp, I bought this as a nervous Nancy "in case of COVID.." 🙄 The box was all beat up, and the item didnt really fit in it, but I didn't think anything of it, strangely, until now. It was used!!! Clearly it was a returned item that wasn't even taken back apart to fit in the box. Officially disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace my old flow meter that has age issues! This meter seems accurate and easy to use. The color coded markers make it easy to keep track.
customer_reviews.author: Mo'ui

customer_reviews.title: Will show if lungs are decreasing capacity if use daily
customer_reviews.text: This airflow meter, although small, if use daily to track your largest exhale -Will be able to show lung capacity decrease before the person actually feels sick. This happened to me recently and got me to the doctor before I got truly ill. Awesome product for the money, and for the help.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how accurate it is. Nothin to compare it to. Works easy enough, just blow. Says I'm breathing like an old women. Guess that about right sure is how I feel.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: No idea how this works
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything to figure out how to use this thing and it is impossible. It is not a returnable item, so waste of my money and in the garbage it went.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Favata

customer_reviews.title: It is useless. Please, believe me: Do not buy this air meter.
customer_reviews.text: It is useless. Please, believe me: Do not buy this air meter. It is a waste of money, and when you find out the low quality, you will be told that is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: MNoonan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to use with reprocuible results
customer_reviews.text: Every asthmatic should have. They should know their personal best reading. When ill important measure of need for corticosteroids and if chronic preventive and rescue medicine is working.
customer_reviews.author: DebbyLA

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Disposable tips are sold at a very affordable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Peak Flow Meter
customer_reviews.text: Congrats to Omron for this Peak Flow Meter it is sturdy and very easy to use. It has red, yellow, and green markers to remind user of their levels.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening package the “box of product” was opened and all ripped. Looked used! Also very cheap and flimsy material. Mostly just gross because I’m the middle of a pandemic I will definitely not use it....looking used and a product that goes in the mouth !!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate reading. Even the smallest exhale makes the marker go to the end. While it’s inexpensive, it doesn’t work as intended and won’t provide you with accurate measurements. I would have returned if I didn’t throw away the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin m.

customer_reviews.title: Device is defective and not eligible for returns
customer_reviews.text: The internal spring of the device is not attached, it is useless this way. Unfortunately the device is not eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for exactly 12 days now. Worked great for that time. But it’s already broken. The little plastic gauge that is supposed to give you the reading doesn’t slide down the meter past half the meter any more. What else to expect from plastic junk.
customer_reviews.author: smilingworm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is meant for personal use only. Not meant for multi person use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward peak flow meter. Very similar to others that are out there. I like the fold out handle, it makes it easier to hold the when using. Its pretty easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: JGonzales

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered... literally.
customer_reviews.text: I am a double lung transplant patient two years out.. My transplant doctor suggested I get one of these to keep track of my lung function from day to day. It does just what I need it to and it seems to be fairly accurate and repeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Didn't likeit
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as expected. You have to suck in air to make this one work!
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: USED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Sent a clearly used product, shoddily taped on one side and open on the other
customer_reviews.author: Natasha J

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily. Very Helpful with Know how bad your breathing for the day. COPD asthma Other issues. Make notes to show your physician.
customer_reviews.author: Frisky Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you're an asthmatic, you need a peak flow meter and this one is reasonably priced, easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Berumen

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and useful
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is really helpful for my asthma and it didn't break the bank!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Gives accurate results. Compared it to my doctor’s at his office, and the readings were the same.
customer_reviews.author: mah jong

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works quite well for me. I took it to my doctor and my results were extremely close to the one he used to test me.
customer_reviews.author: Quietlyone

customer_reviews.title: Felts like its been use
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today when a open the bag everything fail because the box was just damaged
customer_reviews.author: Isa ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Had one I thought was defected, Amazon sent another, exactly same......no matter how hard its blown into the red meter slider barely moves.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great simple product easy to use and monitor with.
customer_reviews.text: Great product measures lung capacity and its simple to use good construction. Glad I can have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kungfujackrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , basic, and delivered before expected.
customer_reviews.text: Met my needs as an asthmatic person. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Defective and they won’t let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money and extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Suni Andriotis

customer_reviews.title: Good for little ones with asthma
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Helps keep my daughter's asthma in check!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for its money, it works great and it is super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Yezek

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectenschlaag! I can already breathe easier. And when I can't, it still comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Viveca Malave

customer_reviews.title: Box was open on both sides
customer_reviews.text: Box was open on both sides when I received package and meter was out of box. This is concerning to me
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Helpful to know when that asthma is REALLY getting you into trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Marie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: When the meter arrived the little tab that moves was inside the meter. When I finally shook it out, I managed to re-seat it in the groove. It didn't even come close to providing an accurate reading. It was always 70 - 80 points lower than other machines. Save your money. I wish I would have read the review before I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: radmama

customer_reviews.title: Different model was shipped.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received wasn't the one pictured. It was a different style by the same manufacturer. It seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Readings
customer_reviews.text: It seems too simple to work but the readings are remarkably consistent. On my "bad" days, the readings will be lower but will group together within a few points. On "good" days, the readings are higher but again in close agreement with one another, if several readings are taken close together. I have a lot of confidence in the device as a good, low cost home check for Peak air capacity of lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Ronkon

product_meta.title: Omron PF9940 PeakAir Peak Flow Meter,White
product_meta.description: Assists in early detection of asthma attacks by accurately measuring peak flow Dual flow range for adult and children Compact design can be used anywhere
feature_bullets: Accurately measures peak expiratory flow rate (pefr), or how quickly air is leaving lungs
Instant readings help track changes in air flow
Assists detection of pending asthma attack
Dual flow range accurately measures for both adults & children

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
